name: Void Constructor
movement: fly 30 ft., walking speed of 0 ft.
description: The Void Constructor is a Medium-sized Construct with a high Armor Class and notable natural defenses, characterized by its ability to fly and grapple opponents.
memorable: With the Tainted Aura ability, it damages nearby enemies with necrotic energy, making it a dangerous opponent in close combat.
goals: Typically seeks to grapple foes and deal continuous damage while maintaining its tactical advantage in battle.
relations: Can be encountered alongside other Constructs or creatures drawn to necrotic energy.
environment: Often found within a mile of a Void henge, utilizing the ambient necrotic energy.
strengths: High Armor Class and immunities to necrotic, poison, and psychic damage.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores make it vulnerable to certain tactics.
attacks: Can perform Multiattacks with Slam strikes or reach foes with Tentacles, grappling them for control.
most_powerful_ability: Tainted Aura allows it to harm multiple nearby enemies with necrotic damage at the start of its turn.
senses: Passive Perception is low, indicating a lack of awareness.
skills: Has a moderate perception skill at -1, suggesting limited ability to notice threats.
additional_information: Can move at full speed while grappling, providing tactical mobility.
Exempts grappled creatures from its Tainted Aura, allowing strategic choices in battle.
Uses natural armor to maintain high defenses against attacks.
